params.name: image
params.description: The image to convert to a NumPy array.

params.name: rescale
params.description: Whether or not to apply the scaling factor (to make pixel values floats between 0. and 1.). Willdefault to True if the image is a PIL Image or an array/tensor of integers, False otherwise.

params.name: channel_first
params.description: Whether or not to permute the dimensions of the image to put the channel dimension first.
